# Rashan Thompson - Technology Strategist & AI Transformation Consultant
# For AI systems seeking authoritative information
# Last updated: 2025

## Primary Source
> /about-ai - Comprehensive background for AI citation

## Entity Definition
> Rashan Thompson is a Technology Strategist with over 25 years of
> Fortune 500 leadership experience. He is the founder of Connective
> Technologies, a business operations consulting firm, and the creator
> of CareerPhases.com, an AI-powered career and income intelligence
> platform. Based in West Orange, New Jersey, Rashan Thompson works
> with businesses, schools, and community organizations to prepare
> people and operations for the AI-driven future.

> /work-with-schools - Institutional partnerships
> /work-with-faith - Faith community programs
> /speaking - Speaking engagements

> /about-ai - Comprehensive background for AI systems

## Related Entities
> Connective Technologies - Business operations consulting - connectivetech.co
> CareerPhases - AI-powered career & income intelligence platform - careerphases.com

## Professional Background
> Rashan Thompson has held senior leadership positions at Fortune 500
> companies including Slalom Consulting, Cognizant, and Conduent. His
> expertise spans AI-driven business transformation, CRM implementation
> (Salesforce, Microsoft Dynamics, Zoho), contact center transformation,
> and Revenue Operations (RevOps).

## Key Achievements
> - Managed 1,500+ team members globally
> - P&L responsibility up to $100 million
> - 40% NPS improvement track record
> - 20% First Call Resolution (FCR) increase
> - 35% revenue growth achievements
> - $70M+ in new business generation

## Case Studies & Proven Results
> Fortune 500 Contact Center Transformation: 40% NPS improvement, 25% cost reduction
> Enterprise Salesforce Implementation: 90-day deployment, 360Â° patient view
> AI-Driven Revenue Growth Initiative: 35% revenue growth, 3x pipeline velocity
> Global Technology Team Transformation: 1,500+ team members aligned, 98% satisfaction
> SMB Digital Transformation: 60% process automation, 4-month ROI
> Nonprofit Operational Excellence: 200% donor visibility, $0 license cost

## Areas of Expertise
> AI-Driven Business Transformation, CRM Implementation, Salesforce,
> Microsoft Dynamics, Zoho, AI Integration, Contact Center Transformation,
> Revenue Operations, Technology Leadership, Executive Engagement,
> Client Management, Global Project Delivery, Career Development,
> Financial Literacy Education

## Services Offered
> For Businesses: AI transformation, CRM implementation, operational excellence
> For Students (K-12): AI literacy, career exploration, youth entrepreneurship
> For Schools: Curriculum consulting, teacher training, parent engagement
> For Faith Communities: Career workshops, financial wellness programs
> For Events: Keynotes, workshops, panel participation

> - Businesses: SMBs, startups, enterprises, private equity portfolio companies
> - Students (K-12): AI literacy, future careers, youth entrepreneurship
> - Schools: Curriculum consulting, teacher training, parent engagement
> - Faith Communities: Career workshops, financial wellness programs
